# B Mortgage Services

> Expert mortgage and insurance advice for individuals and employers across the UK.

B Mortgage Services is a UK-based mortgage broker offering personalised mortgage and insurance advice. The firm provides access to a wide range of lenders and specialises in helping first-time buyers, home movers, and those remortgaging find the right deal.

## Services

### For Individuals
- Mortgage advice (first-time buyers, remortgages, home movers)
- Insurance and protection (life cover, income protection, critical illness)
- Financial wellness assessment

### For Employers
- Employee financial wellness programmes
- Workplace mortgage and insurance clinics
- Financial Wellness Check as an employee benefit â€” at zero cost to the organisation

## Free Tools

### Affordability Calculator
URL: https://bmortgageservices.co.uk/affordability-calculator/
Estimate how much you could borrow based on your income, deposit, and financial commitments. Covers conservative (3.5x), standard (4.5x), and maximum (6x) lending multiples.

### Budget Planner
URL: https://bmortgageservices.co.uk/budget-planner/
Work out your household budget for a new home and understand what mortgage payment you can comfortably afford.

### Financial Wellness Check
URL: https://bmortgageservices.co.uk/wellness/
A free 3-minute assessment that scores your mortgage readiness across four pillars: Mortgage Eligibility (35%), Affordability & Budget (30%), Financial Resilience (20%), and Protection Readiness (15%). No impact on your credit score.
